channel.title: 508 quests problem
channel.description: i can get a questscape because its said ive done all of them but i cant equip it because it says i havnt done dragon slayer. The same with my D plate body. How do i remove all quests, make it so people can get quest capes, and use them, and remove all requirement, like the requirement to where quests capes and d plates?
